name: com.gamelovers.statechart
author: Miguel Tomas
description:
This package allows the use of Statecharts (Hierarchichal State Machine) within an Unity project.

The primary feature of Statecharts is that states can be organized in a hierarchy.
A Statecharts is a state machine where each state in the state machine may define its own subordinate state machines, called substates.
Those states can again define substates.

For more information: https://statecharts.github.io/what-is-a-statechart.html
